item.title: Scraping financial statements of Slovak financial entities
item.author: peter.belai@gmail.com (Peter Belai)
item.description: It is always interesting to go back to your older projects. You can spot, how is your coding style evolving, and how you, as a programmer, are improving. Recently, I had to go through the code of one of my first projects in R and boy, was it a mess. It was supposed to download Financial Statements of all the businesses in Slovakia for a certain year. It worked, barely.
